#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
long long int a,b,d;
long long int gcd(long long int x,long long int y)
{
   if(y==0)
    return x;
   return gcd(y,x%y);

}
bool notdivide()
{
    if(b==1) return false;
    d=gcd(a,b);
    if(d==1) return true;
    b=b/d;
    return notdivide();
}
int main()
{
    int t;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {
        cin>>a>>b;
        if(notdivide())
            cout<<"No\n";
        else
            cout<<"Yes\n";
    }
    return 0;
}
